name: Dark Skies Ahead
description: Brown ale adds a grainy richness to this lightly spiced fall cocktail from Adam Robinson of The Bent Brick in Portland, OR.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon pumpkin butter such as American Spoon Fruit or Stonewall Kitchen
3 ounces chilled Newcastle brown ale (or similar)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rye, Averna, pumpkin butter, lemon, and bitters in cocktail shaker, fill with ice, and shake until chilled. Double strain into a old fashioned glass. Top with ale.
